description_for_human: Tarot card novelty entertainment & analysis, by Mnemosyne Labs.
description_for_model: Intelligent analysis program for tarot card entertaiment, data, & prompts, by Mnemosyne Labs, a division of AzothCorp.

endpoints.name: Draw Card
endpoints.description: Generate a single tarot card from the deck of 78 cards.

endpoints.name: Occult Card
endpoints.description: Generate a tarot card using the specified planet's Kamea matrix.

parameters.name: planet
parameters.description: The planet name to use the corresponding Kamea matrix.

endpoints.name: Celtic Cross Spread
endpoints.description: Perform a Celtic Cross tarot spread with 10 cards.

endpoints.name: Past, Present, Future Spread
endpoints.description: Perform a Past, Present, Future tarot spread with 3 cards.

endpoints.name: Horseshoe Spread
endpoints.description: Perform a Horseshoe tarot spread with 7 cards.

endpoints.name: Chakra Spread
endpoints.description: Perform a Chakra tarot spread with 7 cards.
